channel.title: IDE on K5d
channel.description: Recent content in IDE on K5d

item.title: Code-Server code in your browser
item.description: Hello, it is me again. Today, we will talk about Code-Server an “in browser vs code IDE”. I use Ubuntu 20.04 to test. Have fun! Download Code-Server from github page: https://github.com/cdr/code-server/releases/ You can download rpm or deb file or tar.gz file :). If you download rpm or deb, use PMS of your OS to install it. I download file tar.gz so I just untar it to an folder.
